title: Where Jesus Walked
brief_description: Travel the world of Jesus Christ and walk in the footsteps of the Messiah. Capture the beauty of the Holy Land, yesterday and today, on film never before seen. Follow the paths of Jesus’ travels, from Bethlehem to Nazareth, Jerusalem and Calvary to the Sea of Galilee, Copernicum and Jericho. Beautifully photographed with scriptural narrative and original music.
